name: Repugnant Bounty DEMO
description:
https://www.patreon.com/repugnantbounty

Help us finish the game and earn a lot of cool stuff! downloadable in-dev builds of the game, prototype content, kick-ass merch and more! (must be tier 2 or 3 to get these items.)

Repugnant Bounty has been in development since the start of 2021. We hope to have the game released some time later this year, if all goes well.

Explore the surface of the mysterious planet Irulia in this (roughly) 20 minute DEMO of Repugnant Bounty!

(Also B and A are Z and X, but for some reason itch has B and A swapped so Z is A and X is B???? idk. The emulation isn't accurate anyway, so just download the rom file and run it on BGB or somethin' lol)

Join the Discord! https://discord.gg/qxjXrgA

Join the Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/repugnantbounty

Follow the Twitter! https://twitter.com/RepugnantBounty
